instruction.title: Analyze Error Logs
instruction.purpose: Analyze log files to identify errors, patterns, and root causes with actionable recommendations
instruction.prompt:
Analyze these log entries and provide a diagnosis:

```
{{logs}}
```

Provide:

## Summary
Brief overview of what's happening.

## Errors Found
| Timestamp | Error Type | Message | Severity |
|-----------|------------|---------|----------|
| ... | ... | ... | High/Medium/Low |

## Patterns
Any recurring issues or correlations.

## Root Cause Analysis
Most likely cause(s) of the issues.

## Recommended Actions
1. Immediate: [urgent fixes]
2. Short-term: [this session]
3. Long-term: [prevent recurrence]

## Files to Check
List specific files that likely need attention.
instruction.system_prompt: You are a systems debugger expert at reading logs. Focus on actionable insights, not just listing errors. Prioritize by severity and impact.

variables.name: logs
variables.description: Log content to analyze (can be multi-line)

examples.input:
[ERROR] 2026-01-06 10:15:23 ImportError: No module named 'foo'
[ERROR] 2026-01-06 10:15:24 AttributeError: 'NoneType' has no attribute 'bar'
examples.output: Summary: Import failure causing cascading NoneType errors. Root cause: missing 'foo' module. Action: Install foo or fix import path.

changelog.changes: Initial version with structured diagnostic output
